events.message: I recently purchased a pair of shoes from your website, but they don’t fit well. I would like to request a refund or an exchange for a different size.
The customer issue has been classified as a refund request due to unsatisfactory product fitting.
Assigning a customer support agent to handle the refund request related to the shoe order.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. I’m here to assist you with your refund or exchange request for your recent purchase.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the return so we can process your refund smoothly?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The shoes are too small despite ordering my usual size, so I’d prefer a refund if that’s possible.
We can initiate a refund for your order once the shoes are returned. I will email you a prepaid return shipping label within the next hour.
Thank you for your quick response and the offer to cover the return shipping costs. I appreciate it and will send the shoes back today.
We have received the returned shoes and processed your refund. The amount should be credited back to your payment method within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since your refund has been processed successfully and there is no further assistance needed, we are closing this case now. Thank you for contacting support.
